channel.title: I'd like to see OpenPGP keys of key devs if they have any
channel.description:
As the title says. You can find my [8752 97B0 2B26 F385 E0F6 2087 7185 E3BD C2C7 0715](https://www.reddit.com/r/OpenPGPandGPGkeys/comments/5narmi/8752_97b0_2b26_f385_e0f6_2087_7185_e3bd_c2c7_0715/) OpenPGP key on that link or find my [WhonixMUX.asc key here](http://7t6cvxk4i4vgsz7i.onion/WhonixMUX.asc)(all thanks to your Tor Hidden Services - EASY Introduction guide :slight_smile:)
If you already had posted your keys somewhere and I didn't find them take this as a hint that 1 user had a problem finding your key. Sorry for any inconvenience

item.title: I'd like to see OpenPGP keys of key devs if they have any
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
@Ego’s windows installer is signed with another key.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Windows
  • https://download.whonix.org/windows/ego.asc

We should add this here also:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key

Other Whonix team members are free to post or not post their public key.

Read full topic
item.source: I'd like to see OpenPGP keys of key devs if they have any
